title: Why do i lag in league?
body:
I have all the recommended specs, play on very low everything and have even tried checking files for corruption and designated all my cores to it.

My specs:
CPU: AMD A8-7410
GPU: AMD Radeon R5
RAM: 8gb DDR3

replies.body: The lag could be caused by the health of your network connecting to the game server, and not necessarily with your PC specs.  In this case, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get an analysis of what's happening.  The results should also offer some troubleshooting steps specific to you.  Let me know what you find!
Thanks for that but i need something to fix my fps lag and that was about ping lag, i suspect my shitty gpu honestly

Packet loss and frame drops have similar symptoms,  and running that log reader wouldn't hurt to know for sure.  

You can troubleshoot driver or fps issues as well through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Good luck!
